title: Bizarre conspiracy theory claims Brian Thompson might have hired someone to kill him because...
content: Neil Franklin on a CNN panel recently said that he won't be surprised if it's proved that UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson himself hired the killer to murder him. Franklin said such a possibility for insurance, for many other reasons can not be ruled out because the killer had too much information about the exact time Brian Thompson would appear in front of the hotel.
summary: Neil Franklin on a CNN panel recently said that he won't be surprised if it's proved that UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson himself hired the killer to murder him. Franklin said such a possibility for insurance, for many other reasons can not be ruled out because the killer had too much information about the exact time Brian Thompson would appear in front of the hotel.

title: Elon Musk's 4-year-old son has this 4-word advice for father in viral video
content: "The kid has great instincts," Elon Musk wrote sharing a video of his four-year-old son X AE A-XII giving him some advice. The video went viral as it was the first time X was seen talking. "Barron Trump and Lil X will one day be President and Vice President," one comment to the video said. "DOGE jr for president 2084," another comment said.
summary: "The kid has great instincts," Elon Musk wrote sharing a video of his four-year-old son X AE A-XII giving him some advice. The video went viral as it was the first time X was seen talking. "Barron Trump and Lil X will one day be President and Vice President," one comment to the video said. "DOGE jr for president 2084," another comment said.

title: The Don’s Consigliere: Why Trump chose Allina Habba to be Counsellor to President
content: Habba’s appointment as Counselor to the President reads like a scene from a mob movie. The Boss—facing a never-ending string of legal indictments, defamation suits, and scandals—needed someone not just with sharp legal skills but with undying loyalty. Enter Habba, who has proven herself time and again to be the kind of consigliere who will go to the mattresses for her Don, whether it’s suing Hillary Clinton for RICO or locking horns with Judge Lewis Kaplan in the E. Jean Carroll defamation case.
summary: Habba’s appointment as Counselor to the President reads like a scene from a mob movie. The Boss—facing a never-ending string of legal indictments, defamation suits, and scandals—needed someone not just with sharp legal skills but with undying loyalty. Enter Habba, who has proven herself time and again to be the kind of consigliere who will go to the mattresses for her Don, whether it’s suing Hillary Clinton for RICO or locking horns with Judge Lewis Kaplan in the E. Jean Carroll defamation case.

title: Kamala Harris smiling awkwardly in viral video as Bidens ignore: 'They freaking hate her'
content: President Joe Biden and vice president Kamala Harris were seen together at the Kennedy Center Honors Sunday but it could not be more awkward with the Bidens ignoring the presence of Kamala Harris and Doug Emhoff in a viral video -- even when they four pose together for the cameras. In the viral video, they did not exchange glances or smiles or pretend to know each other.
summary: President Joe Biden and vice president Kamala Harris were seen together at the Kennedy Center Honors Sunday but it could not be more awkward with the Bidens ignoring the presence of Kamala Harris and Doug Emhoff in a viral video -- even when they four pose together for the cameras. In the viral video, they did not exchange glances or smiles or pretend to know each other.

title: Hope rekindled: Syrian refugees return home after Bashar al-Assad’s ouster
MIT 'expels' PhD student Prahlad Iyengar for pro-Palestine essay
content: MIT PhD student Prahlad Iyengar has been suspended until 2026 following a pro-Palestine essay published in a student magazine. ​The October issue of the magazine included the article “On Pacifism,” which featured imagery and language that “could be interpreted as a call for more violent or destructive forms of protest at MIT,” according to an email sent by MIT Dean of Student Life David Warren Randall to the editors of the magazine.
summary: MIT PhD student Prahlad Iyengar has been suspended until 2026 following a pro-Palestine essay published in a student magazine. ​The October issue of the magazine included the article “On Pacifism,” which featured imagery and language that “could be interpreted as a call for more violent or destructive forms of protest at MIT,” according to an email sent by MIT Dean of Student Life David Warren Randall to the editors of the magazine.

title: Star Wars: How Musk vs Bezos space race could reshape humanity
content: Jeff Bezos and Elon Musk are like rival Jedi Masters battling for control of the galaxy's destiny. Bezos, the Obi-Wan Kenobi of space, envisions protecting Earth, the "Chosen One," by moving industries to orbital sanctuaries—akin to peaceful Alderaan. Musk, the bold Luke Skywalker, dreams of leading humanity to Mars, a Tatooine-like refuge, to survive inevitable cataclysms. Their rivalry mirrors a Star Wars saga, from dueling over NASA’s “Death Star” contracts to trading jabs like lightsaber strikes. Whether Bezos’ industrial "Rebel Alliance" or Musk’s Martian "Empire" prevails, their cosmic clash will shape humanity’s next chapter in this galactic epic.
summary: Jeff Bezos and Elon Musk are like rival Jedi Masters battling for control of the galaxy's destiny. Bezos, the Obi-Wan Kenobi of space, envisions protecting Earth, the "Chosen One," by moving industries to orbital sanctuaries—akin to peaceful Alderaan. Musk, the bold Luke Skywalker, dreams of leading humanity to Mars, a Tatooine-like refuge, to survive inevitable cataclysms. Their rivalry mirrors a Star Wars saga, from dueling over NASA’s “Death Star” contracts to trading jabs like lightsaber strikes. Whether Bezos’ industrial "Rebel Alliance" or Musk’s Martian "Empire" prevails, their cosmic clash will shape humanity’s next chapter in this galactic epic.

title: 'Independence from Assad': How the rebel flag differs from the current Syrian flag
content: Syrian jihadist rebels declared victory on Sunday, announcing the capture of Damascus and the end of President Bashar al-Assad's 13-year rule. Assad's ouster marks a major turning point, ending a 50-year dynasty. Celebrations erupted as opposition flags, symbolizing resistance to Assad's regime, replaced his portraits across the nation and in diaspora communities.
summary: Syrian jihadist rebels declared victory on Sunday, announcing the capture of Damascus and the end of President Bashar al-Assad's 13-year rule.  Assad's ouster marks a major turning point, ending a 50-year dynasty.  Celebrations erupted as opposition flags, symbolizing resistance to Assad's regime, replaced his portraits across the nation and in diaspora communities.

title: Did Trump discuss Harry and Meghan Markle with Prince William?
content: Donald Trump asked Prince William about his father King Charles and wife Princess Kate. ​"And I asked him about his wife and he said she’s doing well. And I asked him about his father and his father is fighting very hard, and he loves his father and he loves his wife, so it was sad. We had a great talk for half an hour, a little more than half an hour. We had a great, great talk," Trump said. There was apparently no chat about William's estranged brother Prince Harry, and Meghan Markle.
summary: Donald Trump asked Prince William about his father King Charles and wife Princess Kate. ​"And I asked him about his wife and he said she’s doing well. And I asked him about his father and his father is fighting very hard, and he loves his father and he loves his wife, so it was sad. We had a great talk for half an hour, a little more than half an hour. We had a great, great talk," Trump said. There was apparently no chat about William's estranged brother Prince Harry, and Meghan Markle.

title: Trump's jail threat to Jan 6 committee members; Liz Cheney fires back
content: President-elect Donald Trump said all members of the Ja 6 committee including Liz Cheney and Bennie Thompson should be jailed as they deleted all the evidence from their investigation. Liz Cheney said, “Donald Trump’s suggestion that members of Congress who later investigated his illegal and unconstitutional actions should be jailed is a continuation of his assault on the rule of law and the foundations of our republic.”
summary: President-elect Donald Trump said all members of the Ja 6 committee including Liz Cheney and Bennie Thompson should be jailed as they deleted all the evidence from their investigation. Liz Cheney said, “Donald Trump’s suggestion that members of Congress who later investigated his illegal and unconstitutional actions should be jailed is a continuation of his assault on the rule of law and the foundations of our republic.”

title: Why Hawk Tuah girl's Hawkcoin ($HAWK) crashed so soon
content: Analysis from platforms like Bubblemaps and Dexscreener revealed that 80% to 90% of Hawkcoin's supply was controlled by a small group of wallets at launch. This uneven distribution made the coin vulnerable to massive sell-offs by these major holders, triggering a rapid devaluation.
summary: Analysis from platforms like Bubblemaps and Dexscreener revealed that 80% to 90% of Hawkcoin's supply was controlled by a small group of wallets at launch. This uneven distribution made the coin vulnerable to massive sell-offs by these major holders, triggering a rapid devaluation.

title: Jay-Z accused of raping 13-year-old girl with Diddy: Mapping the journey of 2 hip-hop titans
content: Jay-Z faces accusations of raping a minor alongside Sean "Diddy" Combs at a 2000 party. He denies the claims, calling them a blackmail attempt. The allegations threaten to overshadow the hip-hop moguls' long history of collaboration and rivalry, spanning from the 1990s to their shared billionaire status.
summary: Jay-Z faces accusations of raping a minor alongside Sean "Diddy" Combs at a 2000 party.  He denies the claims, calling them a blackmail attempt.  The allegations threaten to overshadow the hip-hop moguls' long history of collaboration and rivalry, spanning from the 1990s to their shared billionaire status.

title: Watch: Rebel flag raised over Syrian embassy in Russia
'Putin’s decision': Kremlin on ousted Syrian President Assad gaining asylum in Russia
content: Syrian President Bashar al-Assad and his family have been granted asylum in Moscow by Russian President Vladimir Putin after rebel forces seized Damascus. Assad's location remains undisclosed, and no meeting with Putin is planned.
summary: Syrian President Bashar al-Assad and his family have been granted asylum in Moscow by Russian President Vladimir Putin after rebel forces seized Damascus. Assad's location remains undisclosed, and no meeting with Putin is planned.

title: Turkish construction companies rally on expectations of Syria rebuild boost
content: Turkish construction and cement company shares rallied on Monday, fueled by anticipated reconstruction efforts in Syria following President Assad's potential ouster. Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan confirmed Turkey's commitment to Syrian refugee repatriation and reconstruction. Companies like Enka İnşaat, Bursa Cimento, and Oyak Cimento saw significant stock increases, reflecting market optimism about upcoming opportunities in the Syrian construction sector.
summary: Turkish construction and cement company shares rallied on Monday, fueled by anticipated reconstruction efforts in Syria following President Assad's potential ouster.  Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan confirmed Turkey's commitment to Syrian refugee repatriation and reconstruction.  Companies like Enka İnşaat, Bursa Cimento, and Oyak Cimento saw significant stock increases, reflecting market optimism about upcoming opportunities in the Syrian construction sector.

title: Lebanese army says 1 person killed, 4 soldiers wounded in Israeli strike
content: Tension flares in southern Lebanon as an Israeli strike kills a civilian and injures four Lebanese soldiers near a border checkpoint. This incident follows a fragile ceasefire established last month between Hezbollah and Israel after an intense period of cross-border conflict. While the ceasefire largely holds, both sides allege violations.
summary: Tension flares in southern Lebanon as an Israeli strike kills a civilian and injures four Lebanese soldiers near a border checkpoint. This incident follows a fragile ceasefire established last month between Hezbollah and Israel after an intense period of cross-border conflict. While the ceasefire largely holds, both sides allege violations.

title: Donald Trump picks lawyer Alina Habba as counsellor to US president
content: Donald Trump has appointed Alina Habba, his former defense attorney, as counselor to the president. Trump lauded Habba's loyalty amidst his legal battles, including the recent hush-money case conviction. He also announced State Department appointments for Michael Anton as director of policy planning and Michael Needham as counselor.
summary: Donald Trump has appointed Alina Habba, his former defense attorney, as counselor to the president.  Trump lauded Habba's loyalty amidst his legal battles, including the recent hush-money case conviction.  He also announced State Department appointments for Michael Anton as director of policy planning and Michael Needham as counselor.

title: Watch: Syrian rebels find Ferraris, Rolls-Royces, and other luxury cars in Bashar Al-Assad's palace
content: Syrian rebels, led by Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, seized control of Bashar al-Assad's palace after he fled to Russia, ending his 13-year rule. The rebels discovered Assad's extravagant car collection, sparking online outrage. The collection included luxury brands like Ferrari, Aston Martin, and Rolls-Royce, highlighting the stark contrast between Assad's lavish lifestyle and the suffering of Syrian citizens.
summary: Syrian rebels, led by Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, seized control of Bashar al-Assad's palace after he fled to Russia, ending his 13-year rule.  The rebels discovered Assad's extravagant car collection, sparking online outrage. The collection included luxury brands like Ferrari, Aston Martin, and Rolls-Royce, highlighting the stark contrast between Assad's lavish lifestyle and the suffering of Syrian citizens.

title: 'Our tax dollars are somehow funding both sides': Elon Musk on Syrian crisis
content: Elon Musk criticized US funding of opposing sides in the Syrian conflict, highlighting a 2016 report of CIA-backed and Pentagon-backed militias clashing. Syrian rebels claimed control of Homs, celebrating Assad's reported departure to Russia after 24 years in power.
summary: Elon Musk criticized US funding of opposing sides in the Syrian conflict, highlighting a 2016 report of CIA-backed and Pentagon-backed militias clashing.  Syrian rebels claimed control of Homs, celebrating Assad's reported departure to Russia after 24 years in power.

title: 'Defund the police' advocate slammed for asking cops to locate her stolen truck
content: A San Francisco woman, Darcie Bell, known for advocating to defund the police, faced online criticism after pleading for help locating her stolen U-Haul truck containing all her possessions. Bell expressed frustration with the police response, despite filing a report as required by U-Haul. She defended her stance while critics highlighted the apparent contradiction in her actions.
summary: A San Francisco woman, Darcie Bell, known for advocating to defund the police, faced online criticism after pleading for help locating her stolen U-Haul truck containing all her possessions.  Bell expressed frustration with the police response, despite filing a report as required by U-Haul.  She defended her stance while critics highlighted the apparent contradiction in her actions.
